import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { DetailArticleComponent } from 'src/app/composants/detail-article/detail-article.component'; import { PaginationComponent } from 'src/app/composants/pagination/pagination.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-page-article', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, DetailArticleComponent, PaginationComponent], templateUrl: './page-article.component.html', styleUrls: ['./page-article.component.scss'] }) export class PageArticleComponent { }
